title: International D-405
item_description:
International D-405 

Specifications

  • Make: International
  • Model: D-405
  • ID Number Found: D40528507G4167
    • Per DMV, No record found
  • Odometer Reads: 103726
  • Key: Not Available
  • Body Style: Tractor Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Manual
  • GVWR: 34000 lbs
  • Engine: Cummins NH-250

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Orange
  • Doors: 2

Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. No loading assistance or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.

CARB Truck and Bus Regulation Statement: “An on-road heavy-duty diesel or alternative-diesel vehicle operated in California may be subject to the California Air Resources Board Regulation to Reduce Particulate Matter and Criteria Pollutant Emissions from In-Use Heavy-Duty Diesel Vehicles. It, therefore, could be subject to exhaust retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants.” For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/dieseltruck.” This vehicle may be reported as a Non-Compliant Vehicle, and you may not be able to register in California without meeting the CARB Truck and Bus Regulations. It is the buyer's responsibility to read and understand the ARB Multi-Regulation Summary Requirements for Diesel Truck Owners. Beginning January 1, 2020, the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) CANNOT register any vehicle that does not meet the requirements of the Truck and Bus Regulation.

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off of the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
